document.full_text: upbeat earnings from companies including chip maker intel lifted stocks and boosted appetite for riskier assets on wednesday, driving commodities higher and the australian dollar to a 29-year high versus the dollar.
document.title: upbeat company earnings boost global stocks, commodities
lines_and_colors: upbeat earnings from companies including chip maker intel lifted stocks and boosted appetite for riskier assets on wednesday, driving commodities higher and the australian dollar to a 29-year high versus the dollar.
